product_name: Sugoi Silver 87 Bike Jersey - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Set out for a long ride in style with the women's Sugoi Silver 87 bike jersey. Lightweight, high-performance materials let you focus on churning out the miles without worrying about your comfort. FinoTech polyester wicks moisture away, dries quickly and features a smooth, stretchy texture-ideal for high-energy riding. Full front zipper lets you dump heat as quickly as needed. Raglan sleeves encourage free range of motion. Three elastic back pockets expand to stow gear and snacks. Elastic hem keeps the Sugoi Silver 87 jersey in place when riding. Traditional collar with classic stand-up neck band. Sugoi Silver 87 bike jersey follows body contours with a semifitted shape, enhancing performance and preventing fabric from flapping in wind. Closeout.
short_description: Set out for a long ride in style with the women's Sugoi Silver 87 bike jersey. Lightweight, high-performance materials let you focus on churning out the miles without worrying about your comfort.
